FuncDef:
The ike peer command creates an IKE peer and enters into the IKE peer view.
The undo ike peer command cancels the specified IKE peer.
By default, no IKE peer exists.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the name of IKE peer.
It is a string of 1 to 15 case sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
The ike peer command displays the IKE peer view and then defines all the parameters for IKE peer, including:
Negotiation modeID typeNAT traversalShared keyPeer addressIKE version numberVPN instance bound to an SAPeer name
